website_summaries.verdict: A resilient memory foam core delivers uniform support that bounces back after every use.
pros: Firm memory foam construction resists depressions
The 12-degree incline provides adequate elevation for most babies
Waterproof inner lining can also be removed for cleaning
Sized to fit standard cribs without gaps
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
cons: A handful of users stated that the outer cover pills after a few washes

customer_reviews.title: I love that it came in a zippered carry case so ...
customer_reviews.text: My son spits up constantly and I am always keeping him upright for 20-30 min after each feeding but at night that adds up to a lot of missed sleep for me. This wedge props up his mattress slightly so I can put him down to bed quicker and worry less about him spitting up all over himself at night. One of the pictures shows his bassinet with and without the wedge so you can see the difference. I love that it came in a zippered carry case so once he outgrows his bassinet I can store it away nicely until the next one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe & KimbersTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedge !
customer_reviews.text: I love this wedge ! We always put a pillow under the crib mattress for some elevation but this works so much better. It gives the right amount of elevation to where my daughter is laying comfortably and not sliding down the bed from too much. It helps with her breathing and congestion (from allergies). I’m sure this will be a must use in the winter too !
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Newborn Reflux
customer_reviews.text: Like many other parents, I bought this wedge to help my newborn son get some relief from his reflux at night. This is the safer route as opposed to putting a blanket or pillow undermeath a crib or bassinet mattress, and I’m really glad I purchased it. While it doesn’t prevent the reflux from happening completely, I have noticed a decline in the amount of discomfort my 5 week old is in.
customer_reviews.author: EME

customer_reviews.title: It helps with reflux.
customer_reviews.text: My baby has reflux so this is a life saver! She needs to sleep at an incline or she’s in horrible discomfort. I even put it in her stroller bassinet when we’re on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The cover is very soft and the pillow itself is made of memory foam that's firm but not too hard. I appreciate the sturdy storage bag it comes with. Perfect for helping with nighttime stuffy noses!
customer_reviews.author: 박 경주

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! It fits perfectly into our babies sleeper and helps her breathe better at night with a slightly elevated head. It's super soft and comfortable for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product if your baby has acid reflux or a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if your baby has acid reflux or a cold. My baby needs to be elevated after eating to help with acid reflux so this is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: A. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great for reflux.
customer_reviews.text: This bassist wedge is perfect for my little one. Keeps her high enough to keep her food down and she is comfortable. I need another for her changing table!
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: so last week my son has a bad congestion on his chest and bad ear infection laying ...
customer_reviews.text: so last week my son has a bad congestion on his chest and bad ear infection laying flat just made it worse. I use this under his crib so elevate just few inches so his air flow will be much better. He was able to breath a bit better and not cry at night, thank you so much what a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: 4 month old doesn’t stay on it all night but it’s a great little wedge so that he doesn’t lay flat after feedings at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and soft
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for a night so far and baby seems to like it. Looks comfy. I like the removable cover so I can wash it.
customer_reviews.author: reyesalaska52

customer_reviews.title: Nice angle wedge for a not so reflux baby
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very soft wedge and seemed good angle for not so bad reflux baby, but my son kept rolling down it. Bassinet is only so big. I would find him sideways in the bassinet after rolling down. He’s very long so not much room when he’s laying sideways in the bassinet. If your baby has significant reflux, 15 degree angle wedge is not enough.
customer_reviews.author: ac481

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Giving this 2 stars because it does raise one end of the mattress and seems well constructed. What it DOESN'T do however is raise the baby's head to help with reflux. Why? Because the baby shifts down hill. After a ridiculously short period of time, I'd find her wedged near horizontally at the bottom of the ramp. This was a 6 week old infant here so not very mobile. Happened every time. Never got better. She's about to grow out of the bassinet and I can say there was no point this worked as intended.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Baby Slips Down
customer_reviews.text: Put this in our little one's Halo Bassinest to help with her reflux. She would slip down off of it during the night and end up sideways. She's only 7 weeks, so she couldn't adjust herself at all. We only used a couple nights. :-/
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great pitch to alleviate coughing
customer_reviews.text: This wedge is excellent. I am currently using it as my little one has been coughing. It pitches the mattress just enough to help but not too dramatically. It arrives folded but quickly forms to shape. It would be now if it could be folded for storage when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem to work for our baby’s reflux, but more problematic, she slides down on it (I followed the proper placement instructions), which worries me because I don’t want just her head on the incline. I have it under the Bassinet sheet for sleep safety.
customer_reviews.author: Pennyroyal

customer_reviews.title: I can use for my baby reflux
customer_reviews.text: I like the pillow but it’s not what I spect supposed it was memory foam but is not is a simple foam, how you describe the item was, is far to be same. I really need it but I’m disappointed about it. Apart of it I’m so glad I got in time, was shipped really fast. Delivery fast. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies with reflux
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help my baby with spit ups and reflux. He was having really bad colic due to discomfort as well. This helps him sleep at night and mom and dad can catch some sleep too. This fits most bassinets perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Incline
customer_reviews.text: Perfect incline for mattress. When my son is congested I always have a hard time finding a pillow that doesn't incline the mattress too much and blankets cause almost no incline at all. This keeps him elevated easing congestion, keeping him asleep soundly through the night. Fits perfectly in his crib. Quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help with baby's reflux
customer_reviews.text: Fit our SwaddleMe By Your Side bassinet, but it's overpriced for what it is. Didn't help with her reflux; it's too shallow.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but doesn't fit Mi Classic
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our child with reflux. It doesn't fit the Mi Classic Bassinet and posed suffocation issues because he rolled off of it several times. It would be great for any other bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for baby with reflux
customer_reviews.text: Really helped provide some relief to our two month old son struggling with reflux. He sleeps in his crib full time so we really needed an option to give him more comfort. Doesn't replace the need for meds and other interventions (at least for us) but does seem to provide him comfort which is well worth the money. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Do not like the pillow cover, does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: fits my baby’s bassinet perfectly, the foam is comfortable and it gives a good incline. Cons: after a few washes, the pillow cover will start to look dingy and have lint balls on it like on a sweater. Also, I noticed the pillow has changed it’s shape over time and is more curved instead of diagonal.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my baby’s reflux. I’m not sure if it’s successful for that yet, but it fits in his bassinet and is very soft. I like it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Helped with reflux
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 7 week old who is dealing with reflux and congestion. She slept better the first night. It's not a miracle worker but definitely helped. Fits baby bjorn cradle perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: janelle

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: My newborn sleeps longer with this product. Make sure to place wedge under the baby’s sheets to prevent suffocation.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe to use
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Baby slides down to the crib ,very unsafe,I wonder even how the Pediatricians suggest a wedge.
customer_reviews.author: Deepika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for my baby, especially after feeding. Prevents reflux. It’s soft and best of all, easy to clean. Just toss it in the washer!
customer_reviews.author: An Tukinn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Received my pillow last night and it was one of the best purchases I’ve made in a while! I placed it right under the crip mattress. Super soft, and helped my newborn sleep through the night without waking up! I highly reccomend !
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: We used blankets and towels to elevate the bassinet with our first. Wish we had known about this. We bought this for our second child and it works so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Our LO has some reflux and we bought this to help safely elevate him in his crib. So easy to use, just throw it under the mattress and it’s good to go. He does roll down it a little during the night, but it has been helpful
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Cote

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits in crib perfectly. Just enough Incline to help baby breathe better and not have to worry about them rolling off/down to the side.
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect if the baby has reflux
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if the baby has reflux. We couldn't put baby flat after she drank due to reflux. This is firm yet soft.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Wedge pillow
customer_reviews.text: Used this wedge pillow for infant with reflux. I believe it helps elevate her head while sleeping to reduce reflux symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Usefule
customer_reviews.text: It did what it was suppose to. My son suffered from reflux and we needed a slight incline for his bassinet. It is a slight incline. Don't know if it helped but it did not hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for us. The baby kept sliding down in his crib.
customer_reviews.author: K Pa

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders for my newborn. He is congested all the time and spits up. He now sleeps in his bassinet all night! Before this product he would constantly wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I just felt like it didn’t have too much of an incline and my baby just wiggles till she was flat anyways. Good quality product, just not real useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Fits in bassinet perfectly! Adds a small incline if baby will not sleep flat. I also use as a “pillow” for our changing table.
customer_reviews.author: GrizlyBird17

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for all babies
customer_reviews.text: My baby has colic and it helped us a lot for his sleep
customer_reviews.author: shiva

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for congestion when my little one was sick.
customer_reviews.author: NicolePD

customer_reviews.title: Bassinet wedge
customer_reviews.text: The baby hated the wedge. Why we could not figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! No more trying to raise the crib to help baby with acid reflux!! Love this!! Wish I had known about it four years ago with my second child.
customer_reviews.author: Megan P

customer_reviews.title: It’s very cute and comfortable material. Could surely help babies stay on their ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute and comfortable material. Could surely help babies stay on their side. It’s just the right height. The removable and washable cover is great as well. Very nice pillow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just NO
customer_reviews.text: It is not high enough to help with reflux. The package and the wedge were damaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby slides down in bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase although reviews had me second guessing.... wish it worked, however, my son ended up sideways at bottom of bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: N Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for reflux issues for my niece who was a premie
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase if you have a tube fed baby
customer_reviews.text: I have a g-tube baby and the product didn't elevate him to my expectation
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Helped my baby with incline and helped with her reflux.
customer_reviews.author: matt toney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome crib wedge
customer_reviews.text: If your baby doesn’t like to lay flat in their crib or has reflux, you need this crib wedge! Perfect for making baby comfortable and keeping them at an incline. My baby doesn’t like being flat so I thought I would try a wedge to see if she slept better. Works great! I would recommend this wedge!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna F

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product...It's a good size to fit in baby delight co sleeper bassinet.
customer_reviews.text: The wedge pillow is very soft but not too soft like a memory foam which is good because it gives better support for the little head .by baby loves it and sleeps well in it ...it helps with reflex.and it fits in baby delight co sleeper bassinet for which I ordered. So overall I am Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Momma approves and so does baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib wedge! It is perfect for elevating your baby to reduce acid reflux. My baby doesn't like being flat on her back due to reflux issues so this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna F

product_meta.title: Universal Crib Wedge for Baby Crib Mattress | Crib Wedge for Reflux | Reflux Wedge Pillow for Babies with Cotton Removable Cover | 12 Degree Incline
feature_bullets: ♡ BEST CRIB WEDGE ON THE MARKET - Lullababy’s crib wedge is perfect for babies with acid reflux or nasal congestions. Acid reflux is a common condition babies experience as their lower esophageal sphincter is still developing and learning how to function properly. A couple causes of acid reflux in babies are lying down flat too often, or being born prematurely. Lullababy’s premium crib wedge gives your little one a gentle, yet effective 12 degree incline to help improve sleep.

♡ BETTER SLEEP FOR PARENTS AND BABIES - Has your little one been waking up more frequently due to acid refluxes happening throughout the night or during naps? Having a 12 degree incline helps spit ups from occuring, allowing you and your little one to stay fast asleep. Lullababy’s crib wedge is designed for babies and toddlers between 0-36 months old. Great baby shower gift for expecting parents!

♡ SAFE FOR YOUR BABY - Being parents ourselves, we make safety our top priority at Lullababy. Our premium crib wedge has a non-slip base and is BPA, phthalates and lead free. The crib wedge is firm enough to keep your little one elevated throughout the night and to ensure a peaceful sleep. Our crib wedge is 13” L x 27.2” W x 2.75” H, so measure the width of your crib in advance to make sure it will fit properly. The more snug the fit, the better.

♡ EASY TO MAINTAIN - Our goal is to always make the life of parents easier which is why our premium crib wedge is a breeze to clean and maintain. Our crib wedge has a luxuriously soft & breathable cover that’s easily removable and machine washable. Beneath the outer cover, there is a removable inner lining that is waterproof, stain, odor, mold and bacteria-resistant.

♡ LIFETIME WARRANTY - We are confident you will love Lullababy’s premium crib wedge, which is why we offer a lifetime warranty. Our universal crib wedge fits most standard cribs, and helps most babies and toddlers with their acid reflux. If for any reason you find our crib wedge to not meet or exceed your expectations, please let us know and we would be happy to provide a full refund, no questions asked.
